message_1:
A company has collected data on the salaries of its employees. The following table shows a summary of the data:

| Minimum salary | Maximum salary | Median salary | Mean salary |
|----------------|----------------|---------------|-------------|
| $30,000       | $80,000       | $50,000      | $55,000     |

What is the range of salaries in the company?
message_2:
The range of salaries in the company can be calculated by subtracting the minimum salary from the maximum salary. 

Range = Maximum salary - Minimum salary
Range = $80,000 - $30,000
Range = $50,000

So, the range of salaries in the company is $50,000.
